resources.string: An institute is incomplete without its ability to satisfy the huge appetite of thousands of students. Here we list all the canteens and food shops inside the IIEST campus. Feel free to give reviews in the dialog box provided at the bottom of the page. Happy Fooding IIESTians!
We are providing you with the most convenient bus and metro routes to reach the most important destinations from IIEST. Surely you can take a cab or other alternative routes.
Nearest metro station: Rabindra Sadan (active) (9 km) and Howrah (proposed)
Nearest airport: Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose Terminus, Dum Dum (28 km)
Take any of the buses - 1)Esplanade - B Garden, 2)55
Take any of the buses - Barasat - B Garden, Dhamkhali - B Garden , 213A ,Sealdah - B Garden or
Take the bus Sealdah - B Garden

Take any bus to Rabindra Sadan Metro Station, take a metro to Dum Dum station or Belgachia station, then any Airport bound bus. Or go to Sealdah, take any Main line train to Dum Dum and then any Airport bound bus.
We, team FUTURISTS hope to provide you with the small details that every IIESTian needs. Contact us for reviews and suggestions and for any app or web projects.
